title: Tod und Spiele - MÃ¼nchen 72'
overview: Munich, 1972: The Olympic Games should show Germany as a young, cosmopolitan democracy.They are overshadowed by the bloody attack on the Israeli team. 50 years later, the four-part documentary series " Death and Games - Munich `72 " tells the story of an attack that shook the world with the voices of those involved and using newly accessible sources.
